message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I take $60 and you get $40.  A deal's better than nothing if we keep going!
I'll take a bit more, since you wanted to take more in the first round. $55 for me, $45 for you. It's still better for you than getting nothing if we can't agree!
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a little less this time - $55 for me and $45 for you.  We need to agree soon!
You didn't accept my previous offer, and now the money is worth less. I'll take a bit more this time - $57 for me, $43 for you. We need to agree soon, or we'll both end up with nothing!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every round! Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day. A fair deal is better than risking getting zero!
